multiple-choice.question:
You repeatedly and independently roll a fair die until the result of the roll is divisible by 3. Define the random variable $X$ to be the number of times you roll the die. For example, if the results of the rolls are 4, 5, 1, 4, 3, then $X=5$.
What is the expected value $\mathbb{E}(X)$ of $X$?
